markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 572 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** L --- This polished crystal sphere enhances scrying magic. Any visual information received through a spell with the scrying trait that was cast by the _crystal ball_ appears within the sphere, and any auditory information sounds out from the surface of the sphere. When you cast a [_scrying_](/Spells.aspx?ID=268) spell by any other means while holding the sphere, you can relay any information you receive in the same way, allowing others to see or hear the target. The base version of a _crystal ball_ is a sphere of clear quartz, but other versions are made of different stones.
Crystal Ball (Clear Quartz) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 572 4.0 **Price** 3,800 gp Crystal Ball (Selenite) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 572 4.0 **Price** 7,000 gp --- _Scrying_ is DC 36 and gives you the benefits of [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) on the target. Crystal Ball (Moonstone) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 572 4.0 **Price** 7,500 gp --- _Scrying_ is DC 37 and gives you the benefits of [_mind reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) on the target, using the same save DC. Crystal Ball (Peridot) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 572 4.0 **Price** 12,500 gp --- _Scrying_ is DC 39 and gives you the benefits of [_telepathy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=337) for communicating with the target. Crystal Ball (Obsidian) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 572 4.0 **Price** 32,000 gp --- _Scrying_ is DC 41 and gives you the benefits of [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) for anything you watch through it.
